title: 6.23 Constant FPS Jumping -Game Uplayable
body:
Just came back to the game after 2 week break, updated. Non stop fluctuation from 60 fps down to 20 constantly. Its like clockwork up and down up and down , causing a stutter that would make a saint smash a monitor through a wall. Tried system restore, defrag, antivirus ,reload graphics drivers , repair game, lower video settings, v-sync, legacy client, end process league client.exe while playing. Nothing helps. Really sucks. Please halp meh. Can play H1z1 on ultra no problems .
Windows 7 Ultimate
AMD Phenom 2 X6 1100T 3.30Ghz 
Gigabyte motherboard
Nvidia 550 TI
8 g ram

replies.body:
Since you've already tried so many steps, I'd like to you reach out to our tech team. I'd hate to have you try anything you've already tried before. I recommend running a set of logs using our [HRT App](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), then attach them to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can take a look at what's going on.

Let me know if you have any questions.

If i may, it might have something to do with the fact that the client runs in the back-ground now when in-game. 

Also, side note, whats even the point? It just sits there and says that youre still in a game... seems pretty redundant to me.

You're correct, the client does run in the background, however, I've only seen this cause resource issues on lower-end machines. Given the specs that OP posted, I wouldn't really consider they setup *low-end*, given they have at least 8GB of RAM and a solid processor.

Since I'm not on the teams that work on the League Client, I cannot give you a specific reason why the client runs in the background. If I had to guess, it's probably related to keeping you connected to the chat and matchmaking services. 

Let me know if you have any other questions.
that is interesting. i am wondering if we can allocate resources to background programs?
Played with the client shutdown as well, no change. Also worth noting that the fps stutter does does not change with video settings , very low or very high its the exact same 60-30 fps stutter.
Do you have issues with the game crashing occasionally as well?
Thanks for the response much appreciated. Just got home from work. I actually did run hrt last night, opened a ticket and linked logs ticket number is 24450482.
did you ever got your problem fixed? i haven't and i am too thinking of reloading my OS
i have some fps drop in early phase of the game.... they drop from 60 to 48 randomly or with some action in the map idk. tried repairing , reinstalling ... nothing solved.
Seems to be a patch problem. I have the same problem and I see that others are posting the same thing
It has to be the patch, spent 2 days going through everything , just shy of reloading OS . No fixes
